report.title: Explore taxon groups with standard filters for CEDaR
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in CEDaR, with standardised filtering parameters. At the moment, this is the same as filterable_explore_list but also allows filtering by taxon_list_id.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists countcttl on countcttl.id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: Taxon list to limit report to
param.join: JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.taxon_list_id=#taxon_list_id# AND ttl.deleted=false
